thread.title: Willie Nelson Announces New Album God’s Problem Child
thread.title_full: Willie Nelson Announces New Album God’s Problem Child

author: Evan Minsker
title: Willie Nelson Announces New Album God’s Problem Child
text:
4 hrs ago Willie Nelson Announces New Album God’s Problem Child Featuring a tribute to his late friend Merle Haggard and a performance by the late Leon Russell Willie Nelson Photo by Gary Miller/Getty Images 
Willie Nelson has announced a new album featuring new material, Rolling Stone reports . God’s Problem Child is out April 28—the day before Nelson turns 84. It features guest vocals from the late Leon Russell. Closing track “He Won’t Ever Be Gone” is a tribute to his late friend and collaborator Merle Haggard. The album features several collaborations with his longtime producer Buddy Cannon; opening track “Little House on the Hill” was written by Cannon’s 92-year-old mother Lyndel Rhodes. One song, “Delete and Fast Forward,” references the election. 
PledgeMusic bundles of the album include vinyl copies, autographed test pressings, shirts, slipmats, and more. Find the artwork and tracklist below. 
God’s Problem Child : 
01 Little House on the Hill02 Old Timer04 Delete and Fast Forward05 A Woman's Love06 Your Memory Has a Mind Of Its Own07 Butterfly
